Key Arguments: The legislation is viewed as a continuation of anti-democratic measures seen during the COVID-19 pandemic.
The government is accused of attempting to define truth and silence dissenting views.
The proposed laws are seen as unacceptable in a democratic society.
Notable Quotes: Those of us who have seen the Australian governments’ inhumane, unjustifiable and absurd measures during the covid period can easily recognise this bill for what it really is: as a continuation of an obvious anti-democratic power-grab by government over the citizenry.
A government entity as ultimately the last arbiter of truth… this is 1984 in action.
